Html:
So I am using version 2.3.22 (yes) and it takes absolutely AGES to start up. I'm talking 15-20 minutes minimum. Is there anything I can to to make this not take so long, like disable some feature that is no longer supported? I was also having trouble getting the item icons to work but i realized that some pictures were missing from the file. However, I cannot get the talent images to work (I have found the images in a folder but they aren't being used. All i see in the program is some creepy face :S). Obviously not asking for any development on an outdated program version, but if someone could point me in the right direction of fixing these things myself I would greatly appreciate it.

Thanks,

-Upgrayedd
